Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: Ancestry Feat (Choose 3 from any)
Cavern Elf: Has the Darkvision feature
Champion Feats: Class Feat (Choose 6 from any)
Champion Key Ability: 1 selection
Champion's Code: 1 selection
Champion's Reaction: Can use the Champion's Reaction for the chosen champion cause
Deity And Cause: Has the Anathema feature/1 selection
Divine Ally: 1 selection
Elf Heritage: 1 selection
General Feats: General Feat (Choose 3 from any)
Skill Feats: Skill Feat (Choose 5 from any)
Adopted Ancestry (Halfling): Can take Halfling ancestry feats
Anathema: May not perform acts or use spells prohibited by Abadar
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Sense Evil: Can detect the presence of powerful evil auras (Deception vs. Perception negates)
The Tenets Of Good: May not commit anathema or evil acts, harm innocents, or allow harm to come to innocents through inaction
Perception: +18 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +16 (dexterity; trained) Intimidation: +16 (charisma; trained) Performance: +3 (charisma; untrained)
Aquatic Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Legal Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +18 (wisdom; expert)
Arcana: +4 (intelligence; untrained) Medicine: +3 (wisdom; untrained) Society: +17 (intelligence; trained)
Astral Plane Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Military Lore: +21 (intelligence; master) Stealth: +16 (dexterity; trained)
Athletics: +15 (strength; trained) Milling Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +16 (wisdom; trained)
Crafting: +17 (intelligence; trained) Mining Lore: +17 (intelligence; trained) Thievery: +16 (dexterity; trained)
Deception: +16 (charisma; trained) Nature: +3 (wisdom; untrained)
Diplomacy: +3 (charisma; untrained) Occultism: +4 (intelligence; untrained)
Languages: Abyssal; Common; Elven; Gnomish; Jotun; Skald
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Military Lore): Skill Master (Military Lore)
Alertness: Perception Expert
Canny Acumen (Perception): Perception Expert
Champion Skills: Skill Trained (Religion; Choose 6 from any)
Deity And Cause: Skill Trained (Society)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 5 from any)
Skill Training (Aquatic Lore): Skill Trained (Aquatic Lore)
Assurance (Legal Lore): Can take an automatic 23 on Legal Lore checks
Quick Coercion: Can Coerce with 1 rd of conversation
Terrain Stalker (Snow): Sneaking 5' in snow at least 10' from foes requires no Stealth check
Combat
Hit Points: 138 Armor Class: 29 (dexterity (3 max); expert) Class DC: Champion: 28 (dexterity; expert)
Armor: Padded Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Gauntlet (+17 1d4+2 B; strength; expert); Main-gauche (+18 1d4+2 P/S; dexterity; expert); Starknife (+18 1d4+2 P/S [Crit +d6] R20'; dexterity; expert)
Combat Notes:
Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Heavy Armor)
Champion Expertise: Class Expert (Champion)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +22
Deific Weapon: Crossbow inflicts +1 damage die step
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Elven Weapon Familiarity: Attack Trained (Longbow; Composite Longbow; Longsword; Rapier; Shortbow; Composite Shortbow)/Weapon Familiarity (Elf Weapons)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Armor Expertise: Benefits from the specialization effects of medium and heavy armor
Blade Ally: Can apply a choice of disrupting, ghost touch, returning, or shifting to a chosen weapon during daily prep, and critical hits inflict its critical specialization effect
Divine Smite (Enforcer): Retributive Strike inflicts 3 persistent lawful damage on a target who refuses a command
Elven Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon elf weapons
Exalt (Enforcer): Target must obey a lawful command or become shaken (save Will negates)
Quick Shield Block: Can use an additional reaction for a Shield Block once per turn
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Titan Wrestler: Can use Disarm, Grapple, Shove, and Trip on creatures up to 2 sizes larger
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +19 (constitution; master); Reflex: +18 (dexterity; expert); Will: +20 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Divine Will: Save Master (Will)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Aura Of Courage: R15' Reduces the initial value of any self frightened condition by 1, and reduction of a frightened condition at the end of a turn also reduces the fright of allies
Divine Will: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Forlorn: +1 vs. emotion effects, and successes vs. emotion effects are critical successes
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Magic
Focus Points: 1 Attack: Divine: +18 (charisma; expert) Spell DC: Divine: 28 (charisma; expert)
Spells:
Agile Feet (D1 Foc Tra): (1) Self gains +5 Speed and can move normally in difficult terrain for the remainder of the turn
Face In The Crowd (D1 Foc Ill): (1) Self gains +2 Deception and Stealth to blend into a crowd and ignores difficult terrain from crowds for 1 min (heightened 3rd extends the range to 10' and affects 10 creatures)
Magic Notes:
Champion Expertise: Spell Expert (Divine)
Deity's Domain (Cities): Knows the Face In The Crowd divine spell
Deity's Domain (Travel): Knows the Agile Feet divine spell
Devotion Spells: Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Devoted Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
